document_data.name: Ribald Barterman
document_data.mainbody:
'''Ribald Barterman''' was a retired adventurer turned shopkeeper in [[Athkatla]] in [[Amn]] in the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{quote|''One man's meat's another goon's murder, eh? Each to his own then. If ye change yer thinks, I'll be hereabouts.''|Ribald Barterman}}
document_data.Possessions: Ribald Barterman wore a ''[[ring of regeneration]]''.
document_data.Relationships: The [[dwarf|dwarven]] cobbler named [[Brelm]] was Ribald's good friend who could often be found in the [[Adventurer Mart]].
document_data.History:
Ribald was once an adventurer of renown, working with many parties and traveling through half of [[Faer√ªn]]. He lived through many adventures and would talk about killing a [[beholder]] or defeating an [[orc]] horde alone like he speaking of the weather. During his adventuring days, Ribald Barterman worked alongside [[Jaheira]] and the [[Harpers]] on several occasions.

At last, he returned to his home city and opened the Adventurer Mart within [[Waukeen's Promenade]]. He was always ready to give advice and information to young adventurers. Ribald employed a small army of scribes to keep up with the business's demand and keep his catalogues up to date. By the {{YearlinkName|1369}}, Ribald's shop had been open for thirty three years off of which were spent in the same location and bragged about knowing his customers by name. His pet [[wyvern]] named [[Lucy]] could be found fluttering about the Adventurer Mart.
